channel.title: 中考必备 on
channel.description: Recent content in 中考必备 on

item.title: invite的用法
item.description: vt. 邀请 invite sb to do sth 邀请某人做某事 例句 At the end of the lecture , Dr Bosch invited the audience to ask questions and share their ideas.

item.title: lucky的用法
item.description: adj.幸运的 关联短语 lucky day幸运日 lucky dog幸运儿 例句 David has been very lucky because his hobby has brought himpleasure and success. David-直很幸运，因为他的爱好给他带来了快乐和成功。(外研8B-6) I was lucky enough to go to a conference on charity last Wednesday.

item.title: make作使役动词的用法
item.description: vt.做， 制造 关联短语 make a living谋生 make friends with ...交朋友 make plans制订计划 make a decision做决定 例句 Gretel heard this, and Hansel made a plan to save himself andhis sister.

item.title: mix的用法
item.description: vi.&vt.(使)混合，融合 mix up 混合 mix with sb 与某人交际 例句 First,mix together some bread pieces,onions,salt and pepper . 首先，把一些面包片、洋葱、盐和胡椒粉混合在一起。（人教8A-8) If you mix blue and yellow,you get green.

item.title: own的用法
item.description: adj. 自己的 关联短语 on onr's oen 独自，独立，靠自己力量 例句 If you drive after you have consumed alcoholic drinks or are drunk,you are violating the law and risking your own life as well as the lives of others.

item.title: share的用法
item.description: vi&vt. 分享，共用 share...with... 和....分享（共用）.... 例句: We don't have enough books so you'll have to share . 我们没有足够的书，所以你们不得不共用。（朗文考试） I share a bedroom with my sister .

item.title: sound作连系动词的用法
item.description: n.［C，U］声音，声响 近义词 voice 例句 Some of these planes can travel faster than the speed of sound. 这些飞机有的可以飞得比声速还快。（朗文考试） Not a sound was heard.

item.title: stay的用法
item.description: 关联短语： stay up 熬夜，不睡 stay in 在家，未外出 stay out 不在家，外出，待在户外 例句: One evening when it was so warm,I stayed awake on purposeuntil half past eleven.

item.title: visit的用法
item.description: vt.访问，拜访 关联短语 go for a visit 参观，拜访 例句 I was just going to visit a friend. 我正要去拜访一位朋友。 vt.游览，参观 近义词 tour 例句 I'm very happy to have a chance to visit your school.

item.title: worry about 的用法
item.description: 为．…．担心 例句 That way,you can use both hands to work or play sports,and you don’t have to worry about something getting in youre yes .

item.title: 感官动词look的用法
item.description: vi . 看 近义词：watch/see 关联短语 look at 看 look after 照顾 look through 浏览 look forward to 期待 例句 I didn't believe him at first,but then I looked out the window and realized that it was true .
